overview:
Binny is the Co-Founder & CEO of Dezyre Online University. Dezyre offers job relevant certification courses through the internet.

Previously, he was a Sales and Business Development Manager at QuinStreet (San Francisco) - the largest collection of online education portals. At QuinStreet Binny was responsible for $14 million in P&L and ownership over QuinStreet’s primary clients. He also was responsible for coordinating between the technology, creative and media teams to help clients achieve their online marketing goals.

Prior to QuinStreet, Binny was a Senior Analyst in the Investment Banking Division at Credit Suisse (New York & San Francisco) working with clients in Media, Technology and Telecom. At Credit Suisse he worked on transactions worth $25 billion including the SBC-AT&T Merger, Dice.com IPO and First Solar IPO apart from advising clients such as Comcast, Tribune, Global Crossing, eBay, Yahoo, Comcast and Level 3.

Binny graduated with a M.S in Computer Science and Engineering from Washington University in St.Louis were he was a Graduate Student Representative. At WashU, Binny worked on an Image Sensor module that was part of a NASA space mission. He graduated with a B.S in Computer Science from SRM University, India were he was President of the Computer Science Association.

Binny is passionate about education and used to be a part-time school teacher for 2 years in New York City. He was also the New Member Recruiter and Fundraiser for ‘Asha’ - a non-profit focused on education and career development projects in India. During college summer vacations, Binny interned with NIIT - India’s leading training institute.
